tools.name: AI Image Generator
tools.description: Create stunning, high-resolution AI art from text prompts. Our free online AI image generator uses advanced models to transform your ideas into photorealistic photos, digital art, and illustrations instantly. No signup required.
features: Multiple Art Styles: Photorealistic, Anime, Digital Art, Cyberpunk

faqs.question: Is this AI Image Generator really free?
faqs.answer: Yes, 30Tools provides a completely free AI image generator with no hidden costs or subscription models. You can generate unlimited images from text prompts without even creating an account.

faqs.question: How do I write the best AI prompts?
faqs.answer: To get the best results, be descriptive. Include the subject, the environment, the art style (e.g., 'Van Gogh style' or 'Cinematic lighting'), and the resolution ('8k detailed'). The more detail you provide, the better the AI can visualize your idea.

faqs.question: Can I use the generated images for commercial projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, the images generated by our AI are generally free to use for both personal and commercial projects. They are unique creations generated based on your specific prompts.

faqs.question: What is the quality of the downloaded images?
faqs.answer: Our generator supports high-definition outputs. You can download your art in crystal-clear formats suitable for social media, blogs, or even print.

howTo.name: How to Generate AI Images from Text

steps.name: Enter Your Prompt
steps.text: Type a detailed description of the image you want the AI to create in the input box.

steps.name: Select Art Style
steps.text: Choose from various styles like 'Photorealistic', 'Anime', or 'Digital Art' to match your vision.

steps.name: Generate & Download
steps.text: Click 'Generate', wait a few seconds for the AI to process, and download your unique image.

tools.name: PDF Compressor
tools.description: Reduce PDF file size online free without losing quality. Our 2026 updated PDF size reducer uses advanced browser-side compression to safely shrink documents for email and web uploads. 100% private and secure.
features: Lossless PDF compression: Maintain high document quality
Reduce file size up to 90% for optimized sharing
100% Secure: Local browser-side processing, no file uploads
Works on all devices: iPhone, Android, PC, Mac
Batch compression: Resize multiple PDFs at once

faqs.question: How to reduce PDF size online for free without losing quality?
faqs.answer: Upload your PDF to 30Tools, choose the 'Recommended' compression level, and our tool will strip unnecessary metadata and optimize images to shrink the file size while preserving professional clarity.

faqs.question: Is it safe to compress sensitive PDF documents online?
faqs.answer: Yes, with 30Tools it is 100% safe. Unlike other online tools, we process your PDF entirely within your browser. Your files are never uploaded to any server, ensuring total privacy for sensitive data.

faqs.question: Why is my PDF file size still large after compression?
faqs.answer: If your PDF is already highly optimized or composed mostly of low-resolution text, further compression may be limited. Try selecting 'Extreme Compression' for larger reductions if quality is less critical.

faqs.question: Can I compress PDFs for email attachments?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Most email providers have a 25MB limit. Our tool can easily shrink a 50MB+ PDF to under 20MB for easy sharing.

howTo.name: How to Shrink PDF File Size Online

steps.name: Upload Document
steps.text: Choose the PDF file you wish to compress from your device folders.

steps.name: Start Compression
steps.text: Select your compression strength and click the 'Compress PDF' button.

steps.name: Download Small File
steps.text: Once processing is complete, download your optimized, smaller PDF instantly.

features: Convert TikTok to MP3 audio directly
Works on iOS (iPhone), Android, PC, and Mac
Unlimited free downloads with no account required

faqs.question: How to download TikTok videos without watermark in 2026?
faqs.answer: Simply copy the video link from TikTok, paste it into our 30Tools TikTok Downloader box, and click Download. Our system automatically removes the watermark and provides an HD MP4 file.

faqs.question: Can I save TikTok videos to my iPhone camera roll?
faqs.answer: Yes! On iPhone, use Safari to visit 30Tools, paste the link, download the file, and then save it from your 'Files' app to your camera roll easily.

faqs.question: Is it legal to download TikTok videos?
faqs.answer: You can download videos for personal offline viewing or creative inspiration. However, please respect the original creators' copyrights and do not redistribute theirs without permission.

faqs.question: Does this work for private TikTok accounts?
faqs.answer: No, per TikTok's privacy policy, our tool can only download videos from public accounts to ensure user privacy and security.

howTo.name: How to Save TikTok Videos Without Watermark

steps.name: Copy TikTok Link
steps.text: Open TikTok, find the video, and tap 'Share' then 'Copy Link'.

steps.name: Paste in 30Tools
steps.text: Paste the link into the search bar at the top of this page.

steps.name: Download HD File
steps.text: Pick 'Download (No Watermark)' and save your clean HD video instantly.
